title: Beef stew in the slow cooker
ingredients: ['2 medium onions', '2 teaspoons oil', '6 button mushrooms, quartered', '4 medium carrots, peeled', '250ml beef stock', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '600g beef stewing steak', '2 medium potatoes, peeled']
